mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* , rownum rn FROM ( SELECT c.club_post_no , c.club_post_title , c.club_post_ctt , m.name , c.club_post_write_date , c.club_post_hit , a.attach_path FROM club_post c LEFT JOIN mem m ON c.mem_id = m.mem_id LEFT JOIN attach a ON (a.attach_table_pk = c.club_post_no AND a.attach_table_div = 'cp') WHERE c.club_no = #{clubNo} ORDER BY ${sort} c.club_post_Write_date DESC ) A ) B WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{pageUnit} + 1 and #{page} * #{pageUnit}
